General.Name: Green Shift Commodities Ltd.
General.Description: Green Shift Commodities Ltd., an exploration company, focuses on the exploration and development of uranium and related minerals in South America. The company primarily explores for vanadium, nickel, phosphate, uranium, rare earth elements, molybdenum, and zinc deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Berlin deposit located in Caldas Province, Colombia; and holds a 100% interest in the Rio Negro project that consists of approximately 300,000 hectares located in the Rio Negro, Chubut, and Neuquén Provinces in Argentina. The company was formerly known as U308 Corp. and changed its name to Green Shift Commodities Ltd. in October 2022. Green Shift Commodities Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
